title: Panacea Koh Samui launches Beach Concierge Service
text:
Panacea Koh Samui launches Beach Concierge Service Panacea Koh Samui launches Beach Concierge Service Details Category: Hotel Created on Wednesday, 08 July 2015 10:00 Panacea Koh Samui has firmly established itself as one of the island’s most exceptional destinations. In keeping with its signature style of customisation, this luxury leader is delighted to launch a Beach Concierge Service for their discerning guests. 
With its stunning location, Panacea Koh Samui offers an abundant wealth of beach experience choices for its guests. From paddleboard fans to surfers, divers to sunbathers, jet skiers to little swimmers, Panacea takes a truly bespoke approach; selecting the very best that Koh Samui and neighbouring islands have to offer and transporting guests in style, each and every detail is as carefully considered as the resort itself. One example of these exclusive beach experiences is the private speedboat trip to Pangan Island (approx. 15mins from Koh Samui) which includes a chef prepared picnic for the party as well as beach umbrellas, sun loungers and any beach games or toys, pillows, sunshade, sun cream all thoughtfully planned for all ages. It's a consistent theme at Panacea Koh Samui as each and every detail on the estate is thoughtful; the luxurious villas were conceived and designed by leading architect David Clark with stylishly landscaped gardens by Bill Bensley. All five villas at Panacea Koh Samui, are resplendent in their luxury and scale, but it is Praana that is their most sumptuous and indeed one of the most extraordinary villas in the world. Praana, measures 4,700 sqm, with 20 full time staff, and has an HD cinema room with 10 reclining seats, a 300 bottle wine cellar, 6 en-suite bedrooms, 2 infinity pools, (25m & 10m long respectively) a Muay Thai boxing ring, private tennis court, 75 sqm gym, steam room, sauna & massage room, its own nightclub, computer games room, billiard room, nursery & kids club. Chef Alessandro Verdenelli of KX Health Club has trained the chefs at Panacea, ensuring they focus on simplicity, freshness of produce and seasonal ingredients to produce a sophisticated range of Thai & Western dishes as well as detox power juices, fresh smoothies and nutrition rich shakes. Panacea is named after the Greek goddess of healing, so it’s unsurprising that there is an array of integrated wellbeing options on offer. Complimentary yoga sessions are offered daily in each villa, whilst tailored fitness programmes and detox menus can be prepared for those who have more targeted health concerns. Hiking, mountain biking, jet skiing and other sports are available outside of Panacea Koh Samui’s grounds. This incredible destination brings together adventure, comfort and unforgettable Thai hospitality to create an experiential luxury retreat that has reinvented the private villa experience. Exceptional it may be, but affordable luxury it is: for eight guests B&B accommodation with various complimentary services starts at £1,365 per night, or about £170 per person. Private Speedboat excursions to Pangan Island start from £1000 for boat hire, additional costs would incorporate food and beverage requirements. Related articles
